  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable

    public class ChartControl
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
    A SWT control displaying a Chart and hooking it to the SWT framework.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz
